name: Keitha'sDailyAffirmations
0:
”Alexa, open keitha's daily affirmations”
”Alexa, start keitha's daily affirmations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: keitha's daily affirmations
des:
Start your day with an inspirational list of affirmations for entrepreneurs and teenpreneurs. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next affirmation. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.

As a business owner or entrepreneur, self-development is crucial. Grow your business through belief and positive thinking with this selection of affirmations. Keitha Freeman, owner of SuccessFULL Solutions, has compiled a list of affirmations that she uses daily. Use these same affirmations by Dr. Joseph Murphy to help guide you to a positive mindset and way of thinking. Your subconscious mind, also known as the infinite presence of God within us, is powerful and creates the path to either success or poverty. This list of affirmations will guide you toward prosperity, wealth, health and a successful business.

Affirmations from 'Miracle Power for Infinite Riches' by Dr. Joseph Murphy, the author of 'The Power of Your Subconscious Mind'.

Follow Keitha Freeman...

IG: http://instagram.com/keitha_freeman
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/keithafreeman/
Website: http://successfullsolutions.com
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
